mapper.insert: insert into notice( notice_no, notice_title, notice_content, notice_time ) values( #{notice_no}, #{notice_title}, #{notice_content}, sysdate )
mapper.update: update notice set notice_title=#{notice_title}, notice_content=#{notice_content}, notice_time=sysdate where notice_no=#{notice_no}
mapper.select: select * from notice order by notice_time asc
